metadata.description: Mock threat intelligence database containing national/state-level APT infrastructure for demonstration purposes. All IPs are associated with known threat actor groups and include MITRE ATT&CK mappings.
metadata.disclaimer: This is a mock database created for demonstration and testing purposes. The associations between IPs and threat actors are simulated for educational use.
